body:
Hi, I am Geordstar_DE. I am new to this server, But I really like it. FrozenSolstice told me how to get here. He helped me a lot. In real life I like to play basketball, play games such as: Minecraft, League of Legends and watch youtube. I have been playing minecraft for 2 days and I really like it! This is the first server I joined because my cousin told me about it. It's really fun and I think I will stick around. I also want to become a pro at this server so I can beat my cousin. xD I like the nickname: Geo or Geord. And if I ever change my Minecraft Username in the next month. It will most likely be Geordstar123. or Geordstar______. Anyway I will continue to play on your server and have heaps of fun on it. Thank you and goodbye!

P.S Thanks so much FrozenSolstice for helping me out so much. I hope you read this!

title: Geord's intro post!

replies.body: Welcome Geordstarr :P Hope you have fun!
replies.body_tagged: Welcome Geordstarr :P Hope you have fun!

replies.body:
Hey Geord! No problem with helping you out! Glad to see you like the server.

If you'd like to speak to our players on TeamSpeak 3 (a program much like Skype, download here; https://www.teamspeak.com/teamspeak3). You can connect to the Avicus TeamSpeak by using the IP: ts.avicus.net .

Just so you're familiar with the rules, check out this page! https://avicus.net/rules

Also, if you'd like to apply for staff, go to the "Staff Applications" tab for more information. Though I do recommend that you become familiar with the server before applying.

Other than than, the toilets are down the hall on the left, and all that's left for you is to have a great time! Enjoy!

If you have any concerns or need help, contact me through Skype. My name is FrozenSolstice.

P.S: I'm a girl. ;P

Welcome to Avicus!!

replies.body:
Welcome to the server and the forums.
If you have any questions, don't be afraid to ask a community member, make a thread or ask a staff member. We love to help ;)
And btw are you from germany? 
Enjoy your stay!
replies.body_tagged:

If you have any questions, don't be afraid to ask a community member, make a thread or ask a staff member. We love to help ;)
And btw are you from germany? 
Enjoy your stay!
